ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 827
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve never had to hail the NPC to turn in quest stuff, but I usually did to make sure I had the NPC I was looking for. I d also say it could be a bug, but we
ygData.messageBody:
I've never had to hail the NPC to turn in quest stuff, but I usually did to
make sure I had the NPC I was looking for. I'd also say it could be a bug,
but we all know there isn't any bugs in EQ.

Damasciss Kyndhart

> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Nefrahari@a... wrote:
> > Okay this question is very stupid but I haven't done a lot of the
> quests so I
> > don't know. When you go to turn in your quest items, do you need
> to hail the
> > person first? Because when I just gave them the items, they took
> them but I
> > got no rewards. So I'm guessing that happened because I didn't
> hail them first
> > but wanted to be sure that was the reason.
> >
> > "Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
>
> Out of curiosity what quest were you doing? It sounds like you
> either didn't have enough of the item, or the item was stacked.
